remarks: The member of the span in the hyperplane definition does not belong to the hyperplane.  (Contributed by NM, 14-Jul-2014.)
statement:
lshpne0.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
lshpne0.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` W ) $.
lshpne0.p $e |- .(+) = ( LSSum ` W ) $.
lshpne0.h $e |- H = ( LSHyp ` W ) $.
lshpne0.o $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` W ) $.
lshpne0.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LMod ) $.
lshpne0.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. H ) $.
lshpne0.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. V ) $.
lshpne0.e $e |- ( ph -> ( U .(+) ( N ` { X } ) ) = V ) $.
lshpne0 $p |- ( ph -> X =/= .0. ) $.
